## sortedCount() function

Enables observing the sorted property of an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function sortedCount<T>(array: readonly T[]): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

array


</td><td>

readonly T\[\]


</td><td>

The array to observe the sorted property of.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The sorted property.
